name: Swords (itch) (Luke Cooke-Yarborough)
description:
The opening of a text-based game featuring public transport infrastructure, tunnels and some increasingly unwilling professional sword fighters.

A version of the game using OpenDyslexic font is avaialable here: https://lukecookeyarborough.itch.io/swords-opendyslexic-font

Banner images are from Ridolfo Capo Ferro's Gran Simulacro dell'Arte e dell'Uso della Scherma (Great Representation of the Art and Use of Fencing).

Entirely unlicensed playlist for accompaniment (apologies):  https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMaeC3Le-NhWNcj77BO6HZr7Td7D-rgyx
